column6:
"THE SLAVERS",2005,12
The Punisher's got big plans for the head of an Eastern European gang whose crimes chill even his own icy heart. To pull this one off, he's going to have to brush up on his anatomy. But don't worry-Frank's a quick study. Part 4 (of 6).

32 PGS./MAX - Explicit Content ...$2.99
column8: | penciller (cover):Tim Bradstreet | colorist:Dan Brown | writer:Garth Ennis | penciller:Leandro Fernandez | letterer:Randy Gentile | inker:Scott Koblish
